mapper.insert: MERGE INTO SPECIALITY_VIEWS DB USING ( SELECT #{memberId} AS MEMBER_ID ,#{localId} AS LOCAL_ID FROM DUAL ) INPUT ON ( DB.MEMBER_ID = INPUT.MEMBER_ID AND DB.LOCAL_ID = INPUT.LOCAL_ID ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( MEMBER_ID ,LOCAL_ID ) VALUES ( INPUT.MEMBER_ID ,INPUT.LOCAL_ID )
mapper.select: SELECT LOCAL_ID, LOCAL_LOCAL, LOCAL_DISTRICT, LOCAL_TITLE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY LOCAL_ID ASC) AS RN, LOCAL_ID, LOCAL_LOCAL, LOCAL_DISTRICT, LOCAL_TITLE, REPLY_COUNT FROM LOCAL_SPECIALITY ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT v.MEMBER_ID, l.MAIN_CTG FROM SPECIALITY_VIEWS v LEFT JOIN LOCAL_SPECIALITY l ON v.LOCAL_ID = l.LOCAL_ID
